00026 
00027 class func;
00028 class grid;
00029 class defarea;
00030 class boolvec;
00031 class datafile;
00032 
00036 class SURFIT_EXPORT defarea : public data {
00037 
00038 public:
00039 
00045         defarea(boolvec *icoeff, grid *igrd, const char * funcname = 0);
00046 
00048         virtual ~defarea();
00049 
00050         virtual bool bounds(REAL & minx, REAL & maxx, REAL & miny, REAL & maxy) const;
00051 
00052         virtual bool getMinMaxZ(REAL & minz, REAL & maxz) const;
00053         
00055         virtual bool getValue(REAL x, REAL y) const; 
00056         
00058         virtual REAL getMinX() const;
00059 
00061         virtual REAL getMaxX() const;
00062 
00064         virtual REAL getMinY() const;
00065 
00067         virtual REAL getMaxY() const;
00068 
00070         virtual int getQuadsCount() const;
00071 
00073         virtual bool getQuad(int qe_number, 
00074                              float &x0, float &y0,
00075                              float &x1, float &y1,
00076                              float &x2, float &y2,
00077                              float &x3, float &y3) const;
00078 
00080         virtual int getCountX() const;
00081 
00083         virtual int getCountY() const;
00084 
00086         virtual void getCoordNode(int i, int j, REAL & x, REAL & y) const;
00087         
00089         REAL getCoordNodeX(int i) const;
00090 
00092         REAL getCoordNodeY(int j) const;
00093         
00095         virtual int get_i(REAL x) const;
00097         virtual int get_j(REAL y) const;
00098 
00100         virtual bool writeTags(datafile *df) const;
00101 
00103         virtual bool compare_grid(const defarea * defarea) const;
00105         virtual void AND(const defarea * def);
00107         virtual void NOT(const defarea * def);
00109         virtual void OR(const defarea * def);
00111         virtual void XOR(const defarea * def);
00112 
00114         grid * grd;
00115 
00117         boolvec * coeff;
00118 
00120         bool show_smooth;
00121 
00122 };
